channel.title: Dragon Claws Spec Glitch [Deltascape]
channel.description:
I know this has happened to other people before but I lost the link to their post. Heres my problem.
I successfully added dragon claws and everything but when I use the special attack it only hits 3 times and it always misses. Any ideas why?
[b]DELTASCAPE RESPONSES ONLY![/b]

item.title: Dragon Claws Spec Glitch [Deltascape]
item.dc:creator: @triger545 triger545
item.description:
@triger545 wrote:

Ya I will keep this post open because it may help someone else but it didn’t help me sorry.

I use Deltascape source. I am changing my first post to say deltascape.

Read full topic

item.title: Dragon Claws Spec Glitch [Deltascape]
item.dc:creator: @Pest Pest
item.description:
@Pest wrote:

Combatassistant.java , I belive… Maybe it’s spec multiplier is 0.0 or isn’t even set…IF they are not set then add this code case 14484: // Dragon claws id c.startAnimation(3994); c.doubleHit = true; c.usingClaws = true; c.specAccuracy = 2.40; c.specDamage = 1.40; c.specEffect = 5; c.hitDelay = getHitDelay(c.getItems().getItemName(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon]).toLowerCase()); break;NOTE: THIS IS FOR [PI]

IF this does not work, then item.cfg, See if the dragon claws are added there.
IF NOT, Add this code somewhere along those lines.item = 14484 Dragon_claws Slice_N_Dice. 120000 120000 120000 85 75 -5 0 0 10 20 10 0 0 56 0 Hope i helped

Read full topic
